amendment.description: To amend the Crime Control Act of 1990 to improve the quality of background checks for Federal agencies hiring, or contracting to hire, individuals to provide child care services.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2809 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2809 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Boxer.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2809 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2809 proposed by Senator Harkin for Senator Boxer.
